Text.val: 18.11.2014 SH SCR19335 Added update SCPC_DAYS_MQ318 / SCPC_AMOUNT_MQ318
30.06.2014 GB SCR18976 Init new participations: Extended range of selection
24.03.2014 SH SCR18794 Added update SCPC_DAYS_FROM / SCPC_DAYS_UNTIL
10.01.2014 SH SCR18593 Extended SCPC selection with SCPC_WAITFORAPPROVAL = N where SCPC rows are updated/deleted
05.12.2013 SH SCR18571 Added module 'Init new participations'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select A.SCPC_ADMNO, A.SCPC_CLNTNO, A.SCPC_SCFP_NO from :1/SCPC A where A.SCPC_NEW = 'Y' and A.SCPC_TYPE = 1 and not(exists(select * from :1/SCPC B where B.SCPC_ADMNO = A.SCPC_ADMNO and B.SCPC_CLNTNO = A.SCPC_CLNTNO and B.SCPC_TYPE = 1 and B.SCPC_NEW = 'N')) for fetch only

select A.INVS_INVO_NO, A.INVS_FINANCEDATE, A.INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT from :1/INVS A where A.INVS_ADMNO = :2 and A.INVS_CLNTNO = :3 and A.INVS_BPIV_BTCH_ID = 0 and A.INVS_FINANCEDATE is not null and not(exists(select * from :1/INSP B where B.INSP_INVO_NO = A.INVS_INVO_NO)) and A.INVS_UNTRADEDINVOICEPAID = 'N' for fetch only

Text.val: ... perform bookings in T.S. if at least one INVS row is selected
... updated INVS_PARTICIPATION_ADVANCED for current selected INVS row in parent task

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVS where INVS_ADMNO = :2 and INVS_CLNTNO = :3 and INVS_BPIV_BTCH_ID = 0 and INVS_FINANCEDATE is not null for fetch only

Text.val: -- Delete new participant, already existing is updated
-- If new participants are selected (existing participants are updated or
new are 'activated' (SCPC_NEW set to 'N'), start at the end BSF120
